venue.name: Abanca-Balaídos
venue.address: Avenida de Balaídos, s/n, 36210 Vigo, Pontevedra, Spain

Presidential Box.Description: Exclusive seating area offering the best view and luxury experience at Abanca-Balaídos.
Presidential Box.View_Quality: Central view from the best vantage point, exceptionally immersive.
Presidential Box.Unique_Features: Luxury seating, highest level of privacy and exclusivity.
Presidential Box.Accessibility: VIP access with personal assistance, best access routes.
Presidential Box.Special_Perks: Gourmet dining options, meet-and-greet opportunities with players.

VIP Seats.Description: Premium seats with excellent pitch views and exclusive benefits, providing a top-notch football experience.
VIP Seats.View_Quality: Unmatched side views, close to the action.
VIP Seats.Unique_Features: Comfortable seating, complimentary snacks and beverages.
VIP Seats.Special_Perks: Access to VIP lounges, special events invitations.

Grandstand.Description: Elevated side views for an optimal viewing experience, perfect for fans who want a great view without breaking the bank.
Grandstand.View_Quality: Excellent perspective of the entire pitch, clear line of sight.
Grandstand.Unique_Features: Good balance of view quality and ticket price.
Grandstand.Accessibility: Easy access, available facilities for guests with disabilities.
Grandstand.Special_Perks: A popular choice among regular fans for its great value.

General Admission.Description: Affordable tickets providing access to vibrant atmosphere areas, ideal for the most passionate fans.
General Admission.View_Quality: Dynamic view of the game, engaging fan experience.
General Admission.Unique_Features: Access to the heart of the fan sections, lively atmosphere.
General Admission.Accessibility: Standard access, dedicated areas for wheelchair users.
General Admission.Special_Perks: Part of the passionate fan base, traditional stadium experience.

restaurants_bars.name: Casa Solla
restaurants_bars.address: Avenida de Sineiro, 7, 36005 Poio, Pontevedra, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: An acclaimed restaurant offering Galician cuisine with a modern twist, led by Chef Pepe Solla, celebrated for its innovative dishes and local ingredients.

restaurants_bars.name: Taberna A Pedra
restaurants_bars.address: Rua da Taberna, 9, 36202 Vigo, Pontevedra, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: A popular spot in Vigo known for its seafood tapas and bustling atmosphere, offering a true taste of Galician culinary traditions.

restaurants_bars.name: Ruxe Ruxe
restaurants_bars.address: Rua de Vázquez Varela, 46, 36204 Vigo, Pontevedra, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: This lively restaurant and bar is famed for its hearty portions of Galician favorites, live music, and vibrant setting, making it a must-visit for locals and tourists alike.

restaurants_bars.name: Maruja Limón
restaurants_bars.address: Rua Montero Ríos, 4, 36201 Vigo, Pontevedra, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: A Michelin-starred restaurant known for its exquisite fusion of traditional Galician ingredients with international flavors, offering an unforgettable dining experience.

restaurants_bars.name: Follas Novas
restaurants_bars.address: Rua do Príncipe, 56, 36202 Vigo, Pontevedra, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: A cozy restaurant that specializes in Galician cuisine, serving a variety of seafood dishes and local wines in a warm and welcoming environment.

restaurants_bars.name: O Portón
restaurants_bars.address: Rúa de Pizarro, 22, 36204 Vigo, Pontevedra, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: Renowned for its delicious tapas and friendly atmosphere, O Portón is a favorite among those looking to enjoy the local cuisine and culture in a casual setting.

accommodations.name: Gran Hotel Nagari Boutique & Spa
accommodations.address: Plaza de Compostela, 21, 36201 Vigo, Pontevedra, Spain
accommodations.description: Located in the heart of Vigo, this luxury hotel offers sophisticated rooms and a rooftop pool with stunning views of the city, ideal for a relaxing stay.

accommodations.name: NH Collection Vigo
accommodations.address: Avenida García Barbón, 17-19, 36201 Vigo, Pontevedra, Spain
accommodations.description: Situated in the city's commercial and financial district, this hotel combines comfort and convenience, perfect for visitors attending events in Vigo.

accommodations.name: Hotel Coia de Vigo
accommodations.description: A well-established hotel offering spacious rooms and excellent facilities, including a restaurant and meeting rooms, making it suitable for both leisure and business travelers.

accommodations.name: Hotel Ciudad de Vigo
accommodations.address: Calle Concepción Arenal, 5, 36201 Vigo, Pontevedra, Spain
accommodations.description: Boasting a prime location near the marina and old town, this hotel is a great choice for those looking to explore Vigo and its surroundings.

accommodations.name: Eurostars Mar de Vigo
accommodations.description: This contemporary hotel, located close to the beach and offering views of the estuary, features modern amenities and is an excellent base for exploring the city.

accommodations.name: Hotel Zenit Vigo
accommodations.address: Avenida Gran Vía, 1, 36204 Vigo, Pontevedra, Spain
accommodations.description: This central hotel offers comfortable and modern accommodations, with easy access to Vigo's main attractions, shopping, and dining options.

tourist_attractions.name: Islas Cíes
tourist_attractions.address: Parque Nacional Marítimo-Terrestre de las Islas Atlánticas de Galicia, Vigo, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: Part of the Atlantic Islands of Galicia National Park, these islands offer pristine beaches, hiking trails, and spectacular natural landscapes, accessible by boat from Vigo.

tourist_attractions.name: Castro Fortress
tourist_attractions.address: Monte do Castro, s/n, 36201 Vigo, Pontevedra, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: An iconic hilltop fortress offering panoramic views of Vigo and its bay, featuring gardens and archaeological remains.

tourist_attractions.name: Samil Beach
tourist_attractions.description: Vigo's largest and most popular beach, known for its fine white sand, clear waters, and excellent facilities, including pools, parks, and restaurants.

tourist_attractions.name: Museum of Contemporary Art (MARCO)
tourist_attractions.description: A cutting-edge museum housed in a former prison, showcasing a diverse collection of contemporary art from both Spanish and international artists.

tourist_attractions.name: O Berbés Fish Market
tourist_attractions.address: Rúa Cánovas del Castillo, 36202 Vigo, Pontevedra, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: A vibrant market offering a glimpse into the local fishing culture, where visitors can buy fresh seafood and experience the bustling atmosphere.

tourist_attractions.name: Monte do Castro Park
tourist_attractions.description: A large urban park located on a hill in the center of Vigo, featuring walking paths, ancient ruins, and stunning views over the city and estuary.

team_related_activities.name: RC Celta Official Store at Balaídos
team_related_activities.address: Estadio Balaídos, Av. de Balaídos, s/n, 36210 Vigo, Pontevedra, Spain
team_related_activities.description: The official store for RC Celta merchandise, offering a wide range of team apparel and accessories right at the Abanca-Balaídos Stadium.

team_related_activities.name: RC Celta Match Day Experience
team_related_activities.address: Estadio Balaídos, Av. de Balaídos, s/n, 36210 Vigo, Pontevedra, Spain
team_related_activities.description: Attend an RC Celta game at the iconic Abanca-Balaídos Stadium to experience the passion and atmosphere of one of La Liga's teams.

team_related_activities.name: RC Celta Football Camp
team_related_activities.description: Football camps for young fans and aspiring players, offering coaching and training in the sport under the guidance of RC Celta professionals.

team_related_activities.name: Meet & Greet with RC Celta Players
team_related_activities.description: Special events organized for fans to meet their favorite RC Celta players, get autographs, and take photos.

team_related_activities.name: RC Celta Community Outreach Programs
team_related_activities.address: Various community centers and schools in Vigo
team_related_activities.description: Community programs and initiatives led by RC Celta, promoting sportsmanship, teamwork, and football among youth in Vigo.

options.description: Vigo's city bus network offers convenient access to Abanca-Balaídos Stadium, with several lines stopping near the stadium. This provides easy access for visitors coming to see a match or visit the team store.
options.directions: Check the Vitrasa website for bus schedules, routes, and real-time updates.

options.description: Vigo's train system connects the city to other major destinations in Spain, with the Vigo Guixar and Vigo Urzaiz stations offering easy access to the city center and the stadium area.
options.directions: For directions and detailed train schedules, visit the Renfe website or use their mobile app.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity and the best seat selections for RC Celta games.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: A reliable ticketing partner offering tickets for various events, including RC Celta games, within Spain.

best_places_to_buy.name: Resale Platforms
best_places_to_buy.description: Check reputable resale platforms for tickets, especially for sold-out games. Ensure the platform offers buyer protection and is authorized to sell RC Celta tickets.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Look for family packages or group discounts for savings. Mid-week games may offer lower prices compared to weekend games. Sign up for the team's newsletter for promotional deals.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Purchase tickets from official sources or reputable platforms to avoid scams. Be cautious of offers that seem too good to be true, and verify the authenticity of tickets when buying from resale sites.
